resources.name: [concat(variables('databaseServerName'), '/bytea_output')]
resources.comments: To avoid deployment failure, it is recommended to deploy one flexible server configuration at a time. Hence, you will find a dependency chain between all configuration settings. Undocumented constraint based on Azure Support feedback.

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('sudo ./setup_web_server', ' --data_disk_size ', parameters('dataDiskSizeGB'), 'G', ' --db_server_admin_password ', parameters('databaseServerAdministratorLoginPassword'), ' --db_server_admin_username ', parameters('databaseServerAdministratorLogin'), ' --db_server_fqdn ', reference(variables('databaseServerName')).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ' --db_server_name ', variables('databaseServerName'), ' --moodle_admin_email ', parameters('moodleAdminEmail'), ' --moodle_admin_password ', parameters('moodleAdminPassword'), ' --moodle_admin_username ', parameters('moodleAdminUsername'), ' --moodle_data_mount_point_path ', variables('moodleDataMountPointPath'), ' --moodle_db_name ', variables('moodleDatabaseName'), ' --moodle_db_password ', parameters('moodleDatabasePassword'), ' --moodle_db_username ', parameters('moodleDatabaseUsername'), ' --moodle_upgrade_key ', parameters('moodleUpgradeKey'), ' --proxy_ip_address_range ', variables('gatewaySubnetAddressPrefix'), ' --smtp_server_fqdn ', parameters('smtpServerFqdn'), ' --smtp_server_from_address ', parameters('smtpServerFromAddress'), ' --smtp_server_password ', parameters('smtpServerPassword'), ' --smtp_server_port ', parameters('smtpServerPort'), ' --smtp_server_username ', parameters('smtpServerUsername'), ' --web_server_admin_email ', parameters('webServerAdminEmail'), ' --web_server_fqdn ', if(empty(parameters('customApplicationFqdn')), reference(variables('gatewayPublicIpName')).dnsSettings.fqdn, parameters('customApplicationFqdn')), ' --web_server_reboot_utc_time ', parameters('webServerRebootUtcTime'), ' --web_server_resource_name ', variables('webServerVirtualMachineName'), ' > /var/log/setup_web_server.$(date +"%Y%m%dT%H%M%S").log 2>&1')]

resources.name: [variables('diagnosticStorageAccountName')]
resources.comments: Storage Account firewall must be turned off for Guest Metrics to work as per the following reference: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-ca/azure/azure-monitor/platform/metrics-troubleshoot#cannot-pick-guest-os-namespace-and-metrics

resources.name: [concat(variables('webServerVirtualMachineName'), '/', variables('webServerVirtualMachineLinuxDiagnosticExtensionName'))]
resources.comments: Metrics collected by the Linux Diagnostic Extension, sent to an Azure Storage Account and kept for 14 days as per https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/data-platform-metrics#retention-of-metrics.
